alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:56AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Taylor County through 330 AM CDT... At 255 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rib Lake to near Dorchester. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
